Sub-Type / Components: HTTP REST; GraphQL (JSON payloads); WebSocket JSON messages; gRPC-JSON gateway
Features / Functions: Serialize/deserialize; JSON Schema validation; error/status codes; pagination; filtering; auth headers (Bearer/JWT); rate-limit metadata; CORS; content negotiation
Purpose / Role: Interoperable data exchange between frontend and backend services
Example Tools / Systems: fetch; axios; reqwest; serde_json; Postman; Insomnia; Axum; Express.js; NestJS; Rocket
Metrics / Evidence: Schema validation pass %; response time (p50/p95); JSON parsing errors; API version coverage

Features / Functions: Continuous event updates; state sync; push notifications
Metrics / Evidence: Event latency; message delivery rate; connection uptime %

Sub-Type / Components: eth_call; eth_sendTransaction; eth_getBalance; batch requests; provider requests (EIP-1193)
Features / Functions: Encode/decode params; ABI-encoded data handling; return receipts/logs
Purpose / Role: Invoke node methods and contract functions
Example Tools / Systems: Infura; Alchemy; Ankr; web3.js; ethers.js; wagmi; near-api-js; solana/web3.js; Geth; Hardhat node
Metrics / Evidence: RPC success %; gas used per call; request latency; node response codes

Sub-Type / Components: ABI (functions, events); bytecode metadata; deployment artifact JSON
Features / Functions: Describe function signatures; dynamic invocation; event decoding
Metrics / Evidence: ABI parsing success; function resolution rate; event decode coverage

Sub-Type / Components: nonce; to; value; data; gas; signature (r,s,v); chainId
Features / Functions: Prepare/sign TX; send via RPC; decode receipts
Purpose / Role: Represent and transport blockchain transaction data
Metrics / Evidence: TX serialization pass %; signature verification success %; receipt decode errors

Features / Functions: Compiler settings; network URLs; gas price strategy; paths; multi-chain deploy profiles
Metrics / Evidence: Config lint pass %; deployment success logs; compile cache hit %

Features / Functions: RPC ports; peers; genesis; mining; accounts; pruning; consensus params
Metrics / Evidence: Node startup success; genesis hash checksum; peer count; block import rate

Features / Functions: API endpoints; feature flags; wallet provider IDs; version info
Metrics / Evidence: Build consistency; config mismatch detection; feature-flag hit ratio

Features / Functions: Request accounts; sign messages; send transactions; switch networks

Sub-Type / Components: domain; address; statement; uri; nonce; issued_at (JSON object)
Features / Functions: Auth payload template; wallet signature; backend verify -> session/JWT
Metrics / Evidence: Signature verification rate; nonce reuse detection; session duration

Features / Functions: Represent NFT media/traits; on-chain or IPFS references
Metrics / Evidence: Schema compliance; trait decode rate; media fetch success %

Sub-Type / Components: tokenIn; tokenOut; amount; slippage; pool state; orderbook snapshot

Example Tools / Systems: Uniswap SDK; PancakeSwap SDK; 0x API; Jupiter (Solana)
Metrics / Evidence: Execution success %; price impact delta; quote latency

Sub-Type / Components: JSON Schema; type validators (Zod); serde validations
Features / Functions: Reject malformed payloads; strong typing; versioned schemas
Metrics / Evidence: % invalid payloads rejected; schema coverage %; breaking change alerts

Features / Functions: Reduce size; consistent naming; query serialization
Metrics / Evidence: Response size (KB); compression ratio; serializer error rate

Sub-Type / Components: Input sanitization; signature checks; CORS; HTTPS only; JWKS; OPA policies
Features / Functions: Prevent injection; verify identities; enforce origins; encrypt in transit
Metrics / Evidence: CSP header presence; auth success %; blocked attacks; policy pass %

Sub-Type / Components: Schema tests; RPC mocks; fuzzing; integration/e2e; snapshot testing
Features / Functions: Verify contracts & APIs; detect regressions; prove invariants
Example Tools / Systems: cargo test; Foundry/Hardhat; Echidna; k6; Postman/Newman
Metrics / Evidence: Test pass %; coverage %; mean time to detect defects
Log parse %; trace sampling %; alert MTTR
